by-id.reduce: function(keys, values) { var longMe = function (url){var ALPHABET='0123456789abcdefghijkmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ';var num=0;url=url.split('').reverse().join('');for(var digit=0;digit<url.length;digit++){num+=ALPHABET.indexOf(url[digit])*Math.pow(ALPHABET.length,digit)}return num}; var ids = []; values.forEach(function(id) { id = longMe(id); if(!isNaN(id)) ids.push(id); }); return Math.max.apply(Math, ids); }
